subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: St. Louis fell behind by five runs in the second inning Wednesday, and lost its star right fielder Carlos Beltran to bruised ribs while robbing David Ortiz of a grand slam.
snippet: St. Louis fell behind by five runs in the second inning Wednesday, and lost its star right fielder Carlos Beltran to bruised ribs while robbing David Ortiz of a grand slam.
